title: Brilliance of Dawn
description: One must be gallantly courageous to pursue the path of quintessential love but in doing so bravely, we become illuminated by the flourish of the awakened heart, where the bridge between the realms of the spiritual worlds and that of the physical realms brings us closer to the jewels of wisdom, that we are the treasure that we have spent a lifetime searching for.Brilliance of Dawn brings you powerfully closer to the answers in finding the best path to travel upon to find the meaning of your life and awakens you to take the mystical road to self realisation.
author: Mimi Novic
